Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class Messages

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Messages
public class Messages extends Object
Static class containing utilities for working with JsonObject messages

  • Method Details

    • extractElement

      public static com.google.gson.JsonElement extractElement(com.google.gson.JsonObject obj, String key)
      Utility static method that extracts a JsonElement with the given key from the specified JsonObject.
      Parameters:
      obj - the JsonObject from which to extract the JsonElement
      key - the name of property from which to extract the JsonElement
      Returns:
      the extracted JsonElement
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or obj is badly formatted

    • extractArray

      public static com.google.gson.JsonArray extractArray(com.google.gson.JsonObject obj, String key, int minSize)
      Utility static method that extracts a JsonArray with the given key from the specified JsonObject. The array is also checked for a minimum size.
      Parameters:
      obj - the JsonObject from which to extract the JsonElement
      key - the name of property from which to extract the JsonElement
      minSize - the minimum size of the array
      Returns:
      the extracted JsonArray
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null, minSize is negative or obj is badly formatted

    • extractString

      public static String extractString(com.google.gson.JsonObject obj, String key)
      Utility static method that extracts a string with the given key from the specified JsonObject.
      Parameters:
      obj - the JsonObject from which to extract the string
      key - the name of property from which to extract the string
      Returns:
      the extracted string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or obj is badly formatted

    • asString

      public static String asString(com.google.gson.JsonElement elem)
      Utility static method that converts a JsonElement into a String.
      Parameters:
      elem - the JsonElement to convert
      Returns:
      the String contained inside the JsonElement
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if elem is null or not a String

    • extractNumber

      public static long extractNumber(com.google.gson.JsonObject obj, String key)
      Utility static method that extracts a long with the given key from the specified JsonObject,
      Parameters:
      obj - the JsonObject from which to extract the long
      key - the name of property from which to extract the long
      Returns:
      the extracted long
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or obj is badly formatted

    • asNumber

      public static long asNumber(com.google.gson.JsonElement elem)
      Utility static method that converts a JsonElement into a Number, specifically a long. This method works even if the value is expressed as a string in JSON.
      Parameters:
      elem - the JsonElement to convert
      Returns:
      the Number contained inside the JsonElement
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if elem is null or not a Number

    • extractBoolean

      public static boolean extractBoolean(com.google.gson.JsonObject obj, String key)
      Utility static method that extracts a boolean with the given key from the specified JsonObject,
      Parameters:
      obj - the JsonObject from which to extract the boolean
      key - the name of property from which to extract the boolean
      Returns:
      the extracted boolean
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or obj is badly formatted

    • asBoolean

      public static boolean asBoolean(com.google.gson.JsonElement elem)
      Utility static method that converts a JsonElement into a boolean. This method works even if the value is expressed as a string in JSON.
      Parameters:
      elem - the JsonElement to convert
      Returns:
      the boolean contained inside the JsonElement
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if elem is null or not a boolean

    • buildErrorMessage

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject buildErrorMessage(String reason)
      Creates a non-game-specific error message with the given reason.
      Parameters:
      reason - a human-readable string describing why the error happened.
      Returns:
      a JsonObject containing the error message

    • buildErrorMessage

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject buildErrorMessage(long gameId, String reason)
      Creates an error message relative to a game with the given reason.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game this error message is relative to
      reason - a human-readable string describing why the error happened.
      Returns:
      a JsonObject containing the error message

    • buildPingMessage

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject buildPingMessage(long gameId)
      Creates a ping message relative to a game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game this ping message is relative to
      Returns:
      a JsonObject containing the ping message

    • buildEndMessage

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject buildEndMessage(long gameId, String reason, List<String> winners)
      Creates a game-end message relative to a game with the given reason and a list of winning players.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game this error message is relative to
      reason - a human-readable string describing why the error happened
      winners - a list of Strings with the usernames of the winning players
      Returns:
      a JsonObject containing the end message

    • buildLeftMessage

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject buildLeftMessage(long gameId)
      Creates a "LEFT" message relative to a game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the id of the game this ping message is relative to
      Returns:
      a JsonObject containing the "left" message

    • isExpertMode

      public static boolean isExpertMode(com.google.gson.JsonObject createCommand) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Reads the value of the field expert inside a formatted CREATE command (see protocol docs).
      Parameters:
      createCommand - a JsonObject representing the command
      Returns:
      the value of the expert field
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the command passed is null

    • getNPlayers

      public static int getNPlayers(com.google.gson.JsonObject createCommand) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Reads the value of the field nPlayers inside a formatted CREATE command (see protocol docs).
      Parameters:
      createCommand - a JsonObject representing the command
      Returns:
      the value of the nPlayers field
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the command passed is null

    • convertToJoin

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject convertToJoin(com.google.gson.JsonObject createCommand, int gameId)
      Converts a CREATE command into a JOIN command to the same Match (both expressed as JsonObject).
      Parameters:
      createCommand - the command to be converted
      gameId - the ID of the game to join
      Returns:
      the converted command

    • buildUpdateMessage

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject buildUpdateMessage(com.google.gson.JsonObject diffJson, long gameId)
      Creates a UPDATE message given the update field (see protocol docs) and the match ID.
      Parameters:
      diffJson - a JsonObject representing the game update
      gameId - the ID of the match
      Returns:
      a JsonObject representing the UPDATE message

    • buildUpdateMessage

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject buildUpdateMessage(com.google.gson.JsonObject diffJson, long gameId, boolean rejoining, List<String> missingPlayers)
